translations: n.流行，时尚，潮流；乐队花车；（尤指政客追赶的）浪头

phrs.translation: [口语](选举中)站在有胜利希望的一边，支持占优势的一方；看风使舵，随大流
站在某人一边；赶浪头；一窝蜂做某事，跟随潮流

sentences.sentence: In recent months many conservative politicians have jumped on the anti-immigrant bandwagon.
sentences.translation: 最近几个月，许多保守党政客赶上了反移民的浪头。

sentences.sentence: The World Cup bandwagon is starting to roll.
sentences.translation: 世界杯足球赛热潮即将涌起。

sentences.sentence: The bandwagon was big enough for any johnny-come-lately.
sentences.translation: 这股潮流对任何新来的人来说都足够了。
